Header: UNP says MOU for Alliance will not be signed tomorrow
Content: The United National Party says the Memorandum of Understanding for the new alliance led by the UNP will not be signed tomorrow. The Memorandum of Understanding of the new alliance was scheduled to be signed tomorrow. The United National Party said that it was decided to postpone the signing of the agreement after lengthy discussions between Prime Minister Ranil Wickremesinghe and other political parties of the proposed alliance, due to the need of amending the agreement. Therefore, the United National Party said that the agreement would be signed after amendments.
